item.description:
Now’s the time to preserve the summer’s bounty!

Join us for Preserve the Harvest workshop and learn all about the equipment, skills and ingredients you need to start safely canning vegetables from the garden, so that you can enjoy your harvests all year long.

This event is a part of Tastes of the Garden cooking workshop series. The event is free and open to the public, however, registration is required. Please call 617-542-7696 or email info@bostonnatural.org to register.
item.how_to_find_us: ABCD mattapan Family Service center is located at 535 River street and is a short walk from the Mattapan MBTA Station (Red Line) and Blue Hill Avenue bus lines. Street Parking is available
item.name: Preserve the Harvest
